message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $10000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think.
Alice, $10000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8500.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but I can't go as low as $8500. How about we split the difference and meet at $9250? I'm confident this product will be worth more than that to you in the long run.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my offer of $8500. If you're not willing to budge, I'll have to explore other options.
